thread.title: Barry
thread.title_full: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group reviewed by Barry

author: Barry
title: Barry
text: I placed an order for custom print memopads. I was promptly advised by the company that, after a sample printing, my design would come out blurry and not as I intended. After that, my options were discussed and a refund was delivered with no complication. This is about as honest a transaction I've ever failed to complete online, and I'm completely satisfied with the result. Once I get past my own limitations in artwork I will most gladly submit my order with this business again.
